author: Kieran Grieves
description: Long and refreshing with subtle flavours of apple, lemon, ginger and plum wine combining well with the cognac base.
name: The Continental Exchange
recipeIngredient: 20 ml Umeshu plum sake/ Japanese plum wine
25 ml Apple juice (apple cider) unsweetened & cloudy

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
